'''''Mallorn'' 1''' is the first issue of the [[Tolkien Society]]'s journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)|Mallorn]]'', published in 1970.

==Contents==

* '''Editorial'''
** Editorial
*** By Rosemary Pardoe
** Second Editorial...
*** By Darroll Pardoe
** Belladonna's Postbag
*** By Belladonna Took ([[Vera Chapman]]), J.D. Collins, and A.R. Fallone
* '''Notes'''
** Heraldry in ''The Lord of the Rings''
*** By Sam Long
** The Importance of Being Gollum
*** By J.D. Collins
** Brief Notes on Heroic Fantasy
*** By Phil Spencer
** The Languages of Middle-earth
*** By Bob Borsley
* '''Reviews'''
** ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien (by Catherine Stimpson)|J.R.R.Tolkien]]'' by Catherine R. Stimpson (Columbia Essays on Modern Writers)
*** Reviewed by Belladonna Took ([[Vera Chapman]])
* '''Creative'''
** Unicorn Poem (unitled)
*** By Rosemary Pardoe
** Untitled poem ("In the early wind")
*** By Dave Weldrake
** Illustrations
*** By Santos and by Dick Flinchbaugh
